thread.title: Celebrate Valentine's Day With Broadway Love Songs In Ocean City
thread.title_full: Celebrate Valentine's Day With Broadway Love Songs In Ocean City

author: Veronica Flesher
title: Celebrate Valentine's Day With Broadway Love Songs In Ocean City
text:
Arts & Entertainment
Celebrate Valentine's Day With Broadway Love Songs In Ocean City
Enjoy some of Broadway's most romantic songs, performed by the Ocean City Theatre Company.
OCEAN CITY, NJ â€” Love is in the air, so celebrate Valentine's Day with some of Broadway's most romantic songs performed by the Ocean City Theatre Company.
The Broadway Love Songs Cabaret is set for 3 p.m. on Feb. 15 at Ocean City Music Pier. Select performers from the Greater Ocean City Theatre Company's Professional Broadway Series and student programming return to the stage in this casual and intimate cabaret of favorites from the Great White Way.
Tickets are $15.00 for kids under 12 and seniors with tickets at $18.00 for everyone else. All proceeds benefit the Greater Ocean City Theatre Company. Advanced reservations are strongly suggested. To reserve your tickets, visit oceancitytheatrecompany.com.
